title: IS_PED_ACTIVE_IN_SCENARIO
content:
0xAA135F9482C82CC30x05038F1A// IsPedActiveInScenario
BOOL IS_PED_ACTIVE_IN_SCENARIO(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The ped handle.Returns: Returns true if the ped is in a using a scenario and is doing the ambient animations.This is a stricter version of IS_PED_USING_ANY_SCENARIO. It only returns true if the ped is playing the ambient animations associated with the scenario.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for IS_PED_ACTIVE_IN_SCENARIO
IsPedActiveInScenario(ped)
